name: Teczon
description:
Teczon Specialize in Developing Enterprise Level Web, Mobile Apps & Digital Solutions
 
We are an emerging company providing custom software development services to small and Medium Enterprises. We have delivered to the companies looking for Portfolio sites to the VC funded startups. Web Technologies we are providing services in are ROR, Python, React and PHP and using Shopify for an E-commerce solution.
If you are planning your startup or online presence we are great resource to guide you which path that will lead to success in terms of results and cost. We are a small team which has already provided awesome services to startups which are now mid level companies and many individuals who were struggling to get better online presence.
 
Digital Marketing companies should contact us for developing websites exactly the google recommended. We guarantee Good Google Page Speed, Pingdom and gtmetrix results. We are looking forward to offer our consultations and services to you to build long term relationship.
READ MORE...
